price: Woi yε Afutusεm. Nokorε sε Nyame-surofoͻ no wͻ nnkyi pa.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
